Reviews.Content: Loved Nefatari If you want somewhere traditional and quiet (which I recommend) then pick here. The villas are far enough out of Ubud that you feel you are in another world but also close enough that you can go to Ubud whenever you want. There is always a car waiting to take you wherever you want to go. I would also recommend eating in the hotel. The food is just as good as any of the restaurants we came across and very good prices. All the staff want to help you and are just so friendly. Highly reommend here
Reviews.Author: MaireadB

Reviews.Content: Excellent service - Live like a King Stayed in a 2 bedroom villa with private Pool for 2 nights. Lived like a king for 3D2N. Food was brought to the villa for a private meal. After a great meal, had a great dip in the private pool with the family. Whenever we wanted to go to town, the hotel staff (who are absolutely great!) would send us there in their 7-seaters. When we are done in town, we only need to give a quick call to the hotel for a free pick-up! Only improvement area is the cleanliness of the rooms - it was alittle dusty when we reached on our 1st day (mabe due to off-peak season and the room was not occupied for sometime). 2nd day was a great improvement. Overall - had an absolutely GREAT time in the villa. My parents absolutely love it there compared to another 2 nights stay in another villa in town. Private, absolute relaxation, great service  great food!
Reviews.Author: CNChan

Reviews.Content: Perfect location for a getaway! Spot on Service! I was looking for a good Villa accomodation on my honeymoon trip Dec 2007  could only locate 2 reviews on Nefatari Villas  after delibration I still went ahead and booked it.Me  my Wife are in mid twenties  fell in love with the place. It was a perfect setting with the private pool and private location away from the city chaos in the middle of rice paddies. We recieved 5 start service all the way. It was a unique experience and a traditional setting, something we did not get at any other place during our trip that included 5 other countries in south east asia.Overall Bali itself should be a surprise for each first time visitor. I have been to Thailand and many other places where Guests are treated as Gods of sorts, I can tell you in Bali and Nefatari you will get that feeling for real.Thank you for making our time so wonderful there.Bharat - from India
Reviews.Author: Lovebt

Reviews.Content: Nefatari was Magical Our family stayed at the Nefatari for a week from Dec 25, 2007-Jan 1 2008. It was truly a remarkable stay. The staff was tremendous. Our rooms were spacious and lovely. We can not wait to come back. One of the most charming and memorable places we have ever stayed.
Reviews.Author: dennis10

Reviews.Content: Perfect Romatic Getaway @ Ubud, Nefatari Nefatari is tucked away at the outskirts of Ubud, yet it's 5 mins by car/bike to town. Consists of 5 villas in total, we stayed in Villa Jepun. We loved the landscape , completely surrounded by nature. Loved the private pool , the open air concept bathroom, it's absolutely gorgeous. Every villa comes with breakfast  tea time which is served either at their dining or in the villa. One should try their special banana cheese sandwich...Yummmmmm...Fantastic service with a smile...will definitely be back the next time we head down to Bali..Velo Yam  Loi
Reviews.Author: auraglow

Reviews.Content: Perfect! Would stay again and again.       Walkway between villas
Reviews.Author: jezebel2006

Reviews.Content: First rate service and peaceful location We stayed in one of the one bed villas with pool at the Nefatari Exclusive Villas last weekend and had a wonderful experience. It鈥檚 located just beyond Penestatan above Ubud proper.The villa was basically dominated by the bedroom which is celing to floor glass windows on one side which is great during the day.The service was outstanding 鈥?the shuttle service was very helpful and enabled us to see a lot of the area and the breakfasts, served in your villa or in the gardens were great. Essentially the staff seemed happy to do anything they could to make your stay more comfortable, and definitely exceeded our expectations. The only downside was that there was no music system 鈥?take your own CDs to play through the DVD.I wouldn鈥檛 hesitate to recommend the Nefatari 鈥?a great way to chill out.
Reviews.Author: hogsee
